snippet: The trial of Efraín Ríos Montt, the former dictator of Guatemala, for genocide is the beginning of a process, not its conclusion.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Kirsten Weld speculates that trial of former Guatemalan dictator Efrain Rios Montt for genocide could be beginning of process in which Guatemalans start to hold their leaders accountable.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Efraín Ríos Montt, the former dictator of Guatemala, for genocide is the beginning of a process, not its conclusion.

headline.main: A Chance at Justice in Guatemala
headline.print_headline: A Chance at Justice in Guatemala
